titleInfo.title: Semmaterials LP v. Alliance Asphalt Inc
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting in part 35 Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction. Plaintiff's request for a TRO is granted but the Court's ruling on Plaintiff's request for a preliminary injunction is deferred until after a hearing can be held on the request. (cc: Susan Buckley Watson and Cory&Kristina Rose by ja). Signed by Judge Larry M. Boyle. (caused to be mailed to non Registered Participants at the addresses listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF) by ja, )

titleInfo.title: Semmaterials LP v. Alliance Asphalt Inc
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER- Plaintiffs Motion for Preliminary Injunction (contained in Docket No. 35) is GRANTED, disposing of Docket Number 35 in its entirety. The preliminary injunction shall be in effect as of January 3, 2007 nunc pro tunc. Signed by Judge Larry M. Boyle. (caused to be mailed to non Registered Participants at the addresses listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF) by ja, )

titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 38 Motion for Attorney Fees. Defendant Alliance Asphalt shall pay $2,310.00 to Plaintiff for the expense incurred in bringing Plaintiff's Motion to Compel. Signed by Judge Larry M. Boyle. (caused to be mailed to non Registered Participants at the addresses listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF) by jlg, )

titleInfo.title: Semmaterials LP v. Alliance Asphalt Inc
titleInfo.subTitle: FINDINGS OF FACT, CONCLUSIONS OF LAW AND ORDER granting 33 Plaintiff's Motion for Default Judgment and dismissing this case with prejudice. The Court will enter a Default Judgment consistent with the Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law and will include an award of pre-judgment interest under Idaho Code 28-22-104(1) as requested by counsel at the hearing. Plaintiff's oral motion for attorney fees and costs is granted. A copy of this Order along with the Default Judgment shall be personally served on Susan Buckley Watson and Cory&Kristina Rose. Signed by Judge Larry M. Boyle. (caused to be mailed to non Registered Participants at the addresses listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF) by jlg, )

titleInfo.title: Semmaterials LP v. Alliance Asphalt Inc
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT in favor of Semmaterials LP against Alliance Asphalt Inc. Judgment is entered in favor of Pla and against Def in the sum of $110,459 together with prejudgment interest in the amount of $46,050.91 plus $94,970.83, plus prejudgment interest in the amount of $15,622.38 (of original Judgment date of 1/25/07), plus $49,431.25 in attorneys'fees, $1,207.81 in non-taxable costs, and $528 in taxable costs, for a total judgment of $318,270.18. This Judgment shall include post-judgment interest until satisfied in full at the applicable rate pursuant to Idaho Code 28-22-104(2). This case is dismissed in its entirety, with prejudice. Signed by Judge Larry M. Boyle. (caused to be mailed to non Registered Participants at the addresses listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF) by ja, ) Modified on 3/2/2007 to edit text(wm, ).
